metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.og:description: Nicaragua's congress overwhelmingly passed legislation on Tuesday to regulate what can be published on social media and in the news, a move critics condemned as a brazen attempt to muzzle opposition to President Daniel Ortega.

items.snippet: Sep 8, 2021 ... ... glitches and a dip in the cryptocurrency clouded the rollout. ... In barely two years in office, Bukele has taken control of almost all ...

metatags.og:description: El Salvador's historic adoption of bitcoin as legal tender on Tuesday was beset by teething problems, as an angry protest by mistrustful citizens, technological glitches and a dip in the cryptocurrency clouded the rollout.
metatags.twitter:creator: @Reuters
metatags.twitter:image:alt: A Bitcoin logo is seen outside at Sevilla Barber Shop where Bitcoin is accepted as a payment method in Santa Tecla, El Salvador September 6, 2021. REUTERS/Jose Cabezas

metatags.og:title: El Salvador's world-first adoption of bitcoin endures bumpy first day
metatags.article:author: Nelson Renteria,Anthony Esposito
